data.system_settings: Windows 10 Home Insider Preview, x64-Bit, Version: 1809, OS Build: 18252.1000
data.actual_result: The "Update Ready" icon disappears from the application.
data.expected_result: The "Update Ready" icon should still be present for users to select.
data.short_description: The "Update Ready" icon in the top-right of user's screens disappears when you click on "Check for Updates..." in the system tray.
data.steps_to_repro: - Have Discord ready to update ("Update Ready" icon will be present in top-right corner) - Open system tray (Little arrow on taskbar) - Right click on Discord's icon - Click on "Check for Updates..." - Observe the icon disappearing when doing so.
